message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000. It's a great deal for you, and it allows me to get a fair price. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $7,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $8,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $8,000, which is the maximum I can afford. Can you meet me at this price?
